Construct transfer learning model by pre-trained models for COVID-19 classifier (PDF)

Final project of CPSC 340 Machine Learning and Data Mining
(Jan 2020 â€” Apr 2020)

  • Used Pytorch to Implement transfer learning that uses ResNet18 and VGG16 as pretrained models for constructing multi-class classifiers to classify chest X-ray images into three classes; COVID-19, Pneumonia, and Normal.
  • Got 90% average classification accuracy using VGG16 with fine-tuning the last layer. layer
